title: Leather Cloth
description:
3/8\" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. Teal, purple, blue, leather and/or vinyl weft, 3/8-1/2\" wide, separated by 2 shots of teal yarn. 
Stapled & glued to 8.5x11\" card.\"H-3\" on card. (black, blue, green)
